title: Home page boxed content text color adjustments (light/dark mode)

requirements.summary: Ensure text inside the Home page’s primary boxed/card content areas renders black in light mode while staying readable in dark mode.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the text within the primary boxed content area(s) (card-like container with border/rounded corners) is black when the site is in light mode.
In dark mode, the same text remains readable against the dark card background (do not force pure black in dark mode).
No other pages/components have their text colors unintentionally changed.

file_operations.description: Update Tailwind text color classes within the Home page’s card-like boxed sections (e.g., the story card, empowerment card, and the smaller feature cards) to use black text in light mode (e.g., text-black / text-black with opacity for secondary text) while using appropriate dark-mode overrides (e.g., dark:text-card-foreground and dark:text-muted-foreground) to maintain readability without forcing pure black in dark mode.
